text: The Time of the Judgment and the Resurrection of Two Groups

“Now at that time, Michael, the great prince, will arise, ⸤the protector⸥\f + \fr 12:1 \ft Literally “the one who stands with” \f* over the sons of your people, and it will be a time of distress that has not been since \add your people\add* ⸤have been⸥\f + \fr 12:1 \ft Literally “to be” or “being” \f* a nation until that time. And at that time your people will escape, ⸤everyone who is found⸥\f + \fr 12:1 \ft Literally “all \fq of \ft the being found” \f* written in the scroll.\f + \fr 12:1 \ft Or “book” \f*

And many from \add those\add* sleeping ⸤in the dusty ground⸥\f + \fr 12:2 \ft Literally “\fq of the \ft ground of dust” \f* will awake, some to ⸤everlasting life⸥\f + \fr 12:2 \ft Literally “life of eternity” \f* and some to disgrace and ⸤everlasting contempt⸥.\f + \fr 12:2 \ft Literally “contempt \fq of \ft eternity” \f*

But the \add ones\add* having insight will shine like the brightness of the expanse, and \add the ones\add* providing justice \add for\add* the many\f + \fr 12:3 \ft Or “leading the many in righteousness” \f* \add will be\add* like the stars ⸤forever and ever⸥.\f + \fr 12:3 \ft Literally “to eternity and ever” \f*
But you, Daniel, keep the words secret and seal the scroll\f + \fr 12:4 \ft Or “book” \f* until \add the\add* time of \add the\add* end; many will run back and forth and knowledge will increase.”

Then I looked, I myself, Daniel, and look, there were two others standing: ⸤one on this bank of the stream and one on the other⸥.\f + \fr 12:5 \ft Literally “one here on the bank of the stream and one there on the bank of the stream” \f*

Then he said to the man \add who\add* was clothed in linen who \add was\add* above\f + \fr 12:6 \ft Hebrew “from above” \f* the water of the stream,\f + \fr 12:6 \ft Or “river” \f* “⸤How long until⸥\f + \fr 12:6 \ft Literally “Until when” \f* the end of the wonders?”

And I heard the man \add who\add* was clothed in linen who \add was\add* above\f + \fr 12:7 \ft Hebrew “from above” \f* the water of the stream,\f + \fr 12:7 \ft Or “river” \f* and he raised his right hand and his left hand to heaven and he swore ⸤by the one who lives forever⸥\f + \fr 12:7 \ft Literally “by the life of the eternity” \f* that \add an\add* appointed time, appointed times, and half \add an appointed time\add* \add would pass\add* when \add the\add* shattering of ⸤the power of the holy people⸥\f + \fr 12:7 \ft Literally “\fq the \ft power of \fq the \ft people of holiness” \f* ⸤would be completed⸥;\f + \fr 12:7 \ft Literally “to come to an end” \f* \add then\add* all these things will be accomplished.
Now I myself heard, but I \add did\add* not understand, and I said, “My lord, what \add will be the\add* outcome \add of\add* these \add things\add*?”
And he said, “Go, Daniel, for the words \add are\add* secret and \add are\add* sealed \add up\add* until \add the\add* time of \add the\add* end.

Many will be purified and will be cleansed and will be refined, but \add the\add* wicked will act wickedly ⸤and none of the wicked will understand⸥,\f + \fr 12:10 \ft Literally “and not will understand all the wicked” \f* but ⸤those who have insight⸥\f + \fr 12:10 \ft Literally “the \fq ones \ft having insight” \f* will understand.

And from \add the\add* time the regular burnt offering is removed and \add the\add* abomination that causes desolation ⸤is set up⸥\f + \fr 12:11 \ft Literally “to be set up” or “to put in place” \f* \add there will be\add* one thousand two hundred and ninety days.
Happy \add is\add* the \add one who is\add* persevering, and attains \add to\add* \add the\add* one thousand three hundred and thirty-five days.
But you, go \add on\add* to the end and rest, and you will arise for your allotted inheritance at the end of the days.”
